Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Foster/Leclaire
ShortDescription: WB 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Montrose, Milwaukee and into Jefferson Park: due to, street blockage near Foster/Leclaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Montrose, Milwaukee and into Jefferson Park: due to, street blockage near Foster/Leclaire.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains are standing near Dodge due to an obstruction.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains are standing near Dodge due to an obstruction.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: #97 Skokie

  • Also, shuttle buses are requested to provide connecting service from Howard to Skokie in both directions

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Foster/Pulaski

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Elston, Lawrence, Pulaski, & Foster, due to street blockage near Foster/Pulaski.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Reroute at Diversey/Wolcott
ShortDescription: 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Damen, Belmont, Ashland, & Diversey, due to street blockage near Diversey/Wolcott.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Diversey, Damen, Belmont, Ashland, & Diversey, due to street blockage near Diversey/Wolcott.

Allow extra travel time.
